# identifier

**Instance Property**

The unique hardware identifier of the tag.

## Declaration

```swift
var identifier: Data { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.corenfc/documentation/CoreNFC/NFCISO15693Tag/identifier] data is in big-endian byte order.

## Getting Tag Information

- **icManufacturerCode**: The IC manufacturer code of the tag.
- **icSerialNumber**: The IC serial number assigned to the tag by the manufacturer.
